Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 8th overall pick, by Chicago (A) in 1979...
Injured on 5/6/1981 with a Inflamed Hip Muscle, out for one week...
Injured on 5/22/1982 with a Inflamed Back Muscle, out for one week...
Had first career hit on 5/5/1985, off Dan Morogiello (TEX)...
Traded from Chicago (A) to New York (A) on 2/4/1987 (Going to CHW: C M. Fitzgerald. Going to NYY: LF R. Deer)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/11/1987, off Doug Drabek (OAK)...
Injured on 6/23/1990 with a Bruised Ribs, out for 1-2 weeks...
Injured on 7/10/1991 with a Inflamed Medial Collateral Ligament, out for 2-3 weeks...
Signed as a free agent by Minnesota on 2/8/1992 to a 3-year deal worth $1,200,000 per year...
Signed as a free agent by Boston on 9/1/1995 to a 1-year deal worth $300,000 per year...
Drafted in 5th round, 95th overall pick, by San Francisco in 1997...
